htf_bias.description: Higher Timeframe Bias - enter with HTF trend aligned
htf_bias.entry_model: enter with HTF trend aligned, confirmation candle closes, stop below last swing low/high

smart_money_liquidity.description: Smart Money - enter after liquidity sweep
smart_money_liquidity.entry_model: enter after liquidity sweep confirmed with volume spike, stop beyond sweep extreme

fvg_entry.description: Fair Value Gap - enter on FVG touch
fvg_entry.entry_model: enter on FVG touch with trend alignment and volume confirmation, stop beyond FVG

killzone_scalper.description: Killzone Scalping - trade during specific hours
killzone_scalper.entry_model: enter during killzone when price aligns with HTF bias, stop below nearest swing

breakout_volume.entry_model: enter on breakout candle above resistance/below support confirmed by 50% volume spike, ICT trend alignment required

false_breakout.description: Gold Mean Reversion - fake breakout entry
false_breakout.entry_model: enter on reversal candle closing back within previous day range after fake breakout, ICT FVG confirmation optional

ema_trend.description: Gold Trend - EMA crossover with RSI
ema_trend.entry_model: enter long when 20EMA crosses above 50EMA and RSI>50, short when opposite, ICT HTF trend filter applies

bollinger_rsi.entry_model: enter when price touches upper/lower Bollinger and RSI divergence confirmed, ICT FVG trend alignment optional

ml_strategy.entry_model: generate signal from model prediction with ICT features, ATR-based stop, predicted target for take profit
